Title: On The Mend
Description: Now that you have one a battle, we need to heal up your pets so they can fight another day!  Visit Seriadne, our local stable master to heal and revive your pets.
ObjectivesText: Heal your pets to full health by visiting Seriadne the Stable Master.
PortraitGiverText: Seriadne, the local Stable Master can heal and revive your pets.
